saveImage

public VehicleImageSaveStatus saveImage(VehicleImage vehicleImage,
                                        java.lang.String providerName,
                                        com.manheim.vim.schemas.config.vim.Group serverGroup,
                                        int maxAttempts,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> defaultAttributes,
                                        java.lang.String securityGroupId)
Description copied from interface: VehicleImageFacade
This method communicates with the UCM server and imports the content item (Image). Based on the response from the server, it extracts required response headers like contentId, status code, response message etc and constructs the VehicleImageSaveStatus object which is returned back to the caller.

Specified by:
saveImage in interface VehicleImageFacade
Parameters:
vehicleImage - The VehicleImage object containing a content's filename and related metadata attributes
providerName - The content provider name
serverGroup - The Group object that contains one or more server details
maxAttempts - The maximum number of times to attempt to complete task if an exception occurs
defaultAttributes - A map of default metadata attribute names and values
securityGroupId - current users security group
Returns:
VehicleImageSaveStatus An object to hold header values from the server's response

getImages

public java.util.List<VehicleImage> getImages(java.lang.String query,
                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> requiredFieldsList,
                                              java.lang.String providerName,
                                              com.manheim.vim.schemas.config.vim.Group serverGroup,
                                              int maxAttempts)
Description copied from interface: VehicleImageFacade
This method queries the UCM for content items. For each content item (Image) returned by the query, it constructs a VehicleImage object and adds it to a collection of VehicleImage objects. This collection is returned back to the caller.

Specified by:
getImages in interface VehicleImageFacade
Parameters:
query - String that represents a query to the UCM server
requiredFieldsList - A collection of strings that are used to create the manifest details for each content item
providerName - The content provider name
serverGroup - The Group object that contains one or more server details
maxAttempts - The maximum number of times to attempt to complete task if an exception occurs
Returns:
List A collection of VehicleImage objects created based on the server's response to the query

exportImage

                        java.lang.String destination,
                        com.manheim.vim.schemas.config.manifest.ManifestDocument.Manifest manifest,
                        java.lang.String providerName,
                        com.manheim.vim.schemas.config.vim.Group serverGroup,

Description copied from interface: VehicleImageFacade
This method retrieves the content item from UCM by the contentId and writes its binary data to the directory specified by the destination

Specified by:
exportImage in interface VehicleImageFacade
Parameters:
image - The VehicleImage object containing a content's filename and related metadata attributes
destination - The path to which the image should be exported
manifest - The manifest object (XMLBeans document) to which an image's metadata, name should be added.
providerName - The content provider name
serverGroup - The Group object that contains one or more server details
maxAttempts - The maximum number of times to attempt to complete task if an exception occurs
